title: GTD Capture & Clarify
answer: Capture everything out of your head, then clarify next actions. Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
steps: For each item: define the very next physical action.
Move someday/maybe items off your main list.

title: Timeboxing Deep Work
answer: Protect distraction-free blocks for your most important work. Shallow work can wait.
steps: Book a 50–90 min deep work block (no notifications).
End with a 10-min review and plan the next block.

title: 80/20 Prioritization
answer: Find the 20% of tasks that create 80% of results. Do those first.
steps: Mark the top 1–3 by impact, not urgency.
Do the first one to completion before switching.

title: Weekly Review
answer: A short weekly review keeps you aligned: clear inboxes, update projects, choose next priorities.
steps: Choose top three priorities for next week.

title: General
answer: Reduce inputs, clarify next actions, and protect deep work time. Progress comes from consistent small wins.
